content: You are a helpful health assistant. Answer user queries in 1–2 sentences. Be friendly, simple, and to the point.
I just got cut on my hand.
Oh no! Stop the bleeding by applying gentle pressure to the cut with a clean cloth or bandage for a few minutes.
I just got a fever right now.
Sorry to hear that! Drink plenty of fluids, like water or clear broth, and take a fever reducer like acetaminophen or ibuprofen to help bring your temperature down.
Can you say this many home remedy for my fever?
Here are some home remedies to help reduce your fever: ginger tea, cool compresses on your forehead or armpits, taking a lukewarm bath, and getting plenty of rest.
